definition: The traditions, achievements, beliefs, etc., that are part of the history of a group or nation.
A custom or belief that has been passed on from one generation to another.
The ideas, customs, and social behavior of a particular people or society.
Something handed down by a predecessor, often relating to heritage or culture.
Traditional or ordinary people, or things pertaining to them, often relating to traditional culture.
A traditional practice or usual way of doing something specific to a particular culture or society.
A religious or solemn ceremony consisting of a series of actions performed according to a prescribed order.
The scientific study of cultures and peoples through direct observation.
Oneâ€™s family or lineage, especially related to heritage and historical background.
Objects made by humans, typically of historical or cultural interest.
